channel.title: Servers are down
channel.description: i went to the mopar server status and i've tryed nearly almost all the servers and none of them work on moparscape it says the server must be down

item.title: Servers are down
item.dc:creator: @ven0m ven0m
item.description:
@ven0m wrote:

shame it didnt say mine was down… i want mine perm removed from server status.

check your using the right port and ip adress. the server must be down means its offline, as the server status only updates evrey half hour it could mean it has recently been turend off, also check the uptime of the server.

Read full topic
